testcase.name: As a user, I should not be able to log in successfully by providing invalid credentials
As a user, I should not be able to log in successfully by providing invalid email
As a user, I should not be able to log in successfully by providing invalid password
As a user, I should not be able to log in successfully by providing Blank Password
As a user, I should be able to log in successfully by providing valid credentials
As a user, I should be able to log in successfully by providing valid credentials (With ROLE)
As a user, I should be able to create a New Project

As a user, I should be able to create a new task with valid name (screenshots: /Users/william.enciso/Desktop/Courses/QA BOOTCAMP/Exercises/testcafe_automation/screenshots/2021-10-27_13-09-53/Task feature test.png)

testcase.name: As a user, I should be able to create a new task with Different Name
As a user, I should be able to create a new task for tomorrow with valid name
As a user, I should be able to create 10 tasks with different name
